title: The Best Sound System... PERIOD - Volvo S90 Recharge
tags: The best sound system I've ever heard
description: Get 30% off your Linksys Hydra Pro 6 router with code SHORTCIRCUIT30 at:   Volvo's S90 Recharge is a plug-in hybrid electric vehicle (PHEV), so it's not entirely electric, but it will help you stretch your fuel consumption with its electric motor. Overall, the car is fantastic. Acceleration, overall speed, comfort, and Alex's favorite, the sound system!  Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Linus Media Group.  Want us to unbox something specifically for a video?
